Sentencas: Thermodynamic analysis of hydrogen production by steam reforming and autothermal reforming of bio-butanol was investigated for solid oxide fuel cell applications.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and heat integration for hydrogen production from bio-butanol for SOFC application: Steam reforming vs. autothermal reforming

Sentencas: The effects of reformer operating conditions, e.g., reformer temperature, steam to carbon molar ratio, and oxygen to carbon molar ratio, were investigated with the objective to maximize hydrogen production and to reduce utility requirements of the process and based on which favorable conditions of reformer were proposed.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and heat integration for hydrogen production from bio-butanol for SOFC application: Steam reforming vs. autothermal reforming

Sentencas: Process flow diagram for steam reforming and autothermal reforming integrated with solid oxide fuel cell was developed.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and heat integration for hydrogen production from bio-butanol for SOFC application: Steam reforming vs. autothermal reforming

Sentencas: Heat integration with pinch analysis method was carried out for both the processes at favorable reformer conditions.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and heat integration for hydrogen production from bio-butanol for SOFC application: Steam reforming vs. autothermal reforming

Sentencas: Power generation, electrical efficiency, useful energy for co-generation application, and utility requirements for both the processes were compared.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis and heat integration for hydrogen production from bio-butanol for SOFC application: Steam reforming vs. autothermal reforming
